meanings.definition: A store selling cold cuts, cheeses, and a variety of salads and sandwiches.
meanings.sent1: I went to the deli to buy some ham and cheese for my sandwich.
meanings.sent2: The deli on the corner always has fresh salads and sandwiches.
meanings.sent3: The deli was so busy that the sandwiches started making jokes to each other.
meanings.sent4: The deli was a treasure trove of flavors waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The deli's aroma of freshly baked bread and cured meats lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: A type of sandwich typically made with meats, cheeses, and condiments on a long roll.
meanings.sent1: For lunch, I ordered a delicious deli with turkey and Swiss cheese.
meanings.sent2: The deli at the party was a hit with its assortment of sandwiches.
meanings.sent3: The deli sandwich was so big, it could barely fit in my mouth!
meanings.sent4: The deli sandwich was a tower of flavors stacked on a crispy roll.
meanings.sent5: The deli sandwich melted in my mouth, leaving a savory aftertaste.
